value.title: StarCraft 2: Scarlett Plays PROTOSS in a Tournament?! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2 where Scarlett decides to offrace as Protoss versus Namshar. While she normally plays Zerg, she decides to mix it up and play some of the most frustrating Protoss versus Zerg I''ve seen in a while.
